title: Arcane Trickster
content:
Casters. Cannot change equipped spells freely. Can only swap equipped spells on level up. Ritual Casting: Yes (Baldur's Gate 3 custom changes. No in D&D)

BG3 Arcane Trickster Features Progression

Level 3 Level 1 Arcane Trickster Spellcasting (Subclass Feature) Mage Hand Legerdemain (An improved version of Mage Hand) (Subclass Feature) Level 7 Level 2 Arcane Trickster Spellcasting (Subclass Feature) Level 9 Magical Ambush (Subclass Feature) Level 10 Choose 1 additional Arcane Trickster Cantrip
